channel.title: Changing The Words In The RS ChatBox When U First Log On?
channel.description:
hi i need to know how to change the things that are in the chatbox when u first log on because its really annoying
please help

item.title: Changing The Words In The RS ChatBox When U First Log On?
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

doesn’t he mean “Welcome to ____scape”?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Words In The RS ChatBox When U First Log On?

item.title: Changing The Words In The RS ChatBox When U First Log On?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Go into ur client.java and search with ctrl + f for

playerXP = loadgame.playerXP;

down that line u will see something like this

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": has logged into [ur source/server name]

its possible its a little bit other but it will look like this a little bit

just edit the has logged into for example, ut dont delete the PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+":
thats really needed so its says the name of the player who logged in

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Words In The RS ChatBox When U First Log On?
